content: make your own dapper-looking prawns complete with fancy antenna-mustaches these are very fast to make - it takes me about an hour to finish one the pattern is 4 pages long and it contains 3 big pictures of the finished product and various stages along the way i ve written out the instructions longhand so you don t have to decipher any code the pattern calls for a size g hook and worsted weight yarn in addition a small amount of felt embroidery floss and two seed beads are used you will need to know how to do or google single_crochet double_crochet slip chain increase and decrease part of the pattern is worked in a spiral and the other is worked straight
